titles.title: A bill to amend the Financial Stability Act of 2010 to provide a criminal penalty for unauthorized disclosures by officers or employees of a Federal agency of certain living will and stress test determinations.
Prevention of Private Information Dissemination Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
